mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT O.C_ID, C.C_NAME FROM ORDERS O JOIN CUSTOMER C ON O.C_ID = C.C_ID WHERE S_ID= #{sId}
SELECT c.c_id, c.c_nick, c.c_name, c.c_tel, c.c_add, c.c_join, r.MILEAGE FROM customer c left OUTER JOIN reserve r ON (c.c_id = r.c_id and r.s_id = #{sId}) where c.c_id = #{cId}

SELECT o.c_id, o.o_num, CASE WHEN od.ca_num='CAOP' OR od.ca_num='CAIC' OR od.ca_num='CAHT' THEN 'â†³'||r.OP_NAME ELSE m.m_name END m_name , CASE WHEN od.ca_num='CAOP' OR od.ca_num='CAIC' OR od.ca_num='CAHT' THEN r.op_price else m.m_price end total, o.pay_method, o.receipt FROM ORDERS o JOIN order_details od ON od.o_num = o.o_num JOIN MENU m on od.M_NUM = m.M_NUM JOIN recipe r on od.RECIPENO = r.RECIPENO WHERE o.c_id = #{cId} AND o.S_ID= #{sId} AND o.O_DATE > ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(sysdate), -1) ORDER by o.O_NUM, od.O_DNUM
